name: Bubble Princess
description:
Most growing girl love dressing up dolls. ‘‘Bubble Princes is one such game young girls would love to play.


***GamePlay****
Bubble Princes is a fun-filled kids app that lets kids change hair, apparel, skin color, eye brow, eye color, eye shadow, eye lash, blush, lips & accessories and dress the doll in several avatars. Its time to dress the doll of your dreams, a fashion model or sports girl !

***Game Benefits***
- Boosts imaginative skills in kids
- Improves creativity in them
- Fun past time


***Game Features***

- Customize the doll’s hair style, dress, make-up & accessories etc
- Choose from over 25 option in outfits, hair styles &
- Style her hair, skin, eyes, eyebrows, lipstick, clothing, by selecting color and style
- Add accessories like headgear or necklace
- Create several avatars with unique combinations


So, parents what are you waiting for? Download this amazing game ‘Bubble Princes’ and enhance your kid’s imagination & creativity besides keeping them occupied in leisure time!!
